name: clothes-shipping-monorepo
description: E-commerce platform for clothes shipping from China

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:mobile" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:customer" "npm run start:supplier"
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d postgres && sleep 10 && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:mobile && npm run test:customer
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:mobile && npm run lint:customer
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:admin && npm run build:customer && npm run build:supplier
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:mobile && npm run clean:admin && npm run clean:customer && npm run clean:supplier
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.clean:mobile: cd mobile && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.clean:admin: cd admin-panel && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.clean:customer: cd customer-website && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.clean:supplier: cd supplier-portal && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.install:all: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd mobile && npm install" "cd admin-panel && npm install" "cd customer-website && npm install" "cd supplier-portal && npm install"
scripts.update:all: npm update && cd backend && npm update && cd ../mobile && npm update && cd ../admin-panel && npm update && cd ../customer-website && npm update && cd ../supplier-portal && npm update

author: Clothes Shipping Team
